creator: velsof
descriptionHtml:
Magento Mobile App Builder

Magento Android Mobile App builder offers the easiest way for the Magento
eCommerce store owners to uplift their business with a fully-functional mobile app.
You can now build your own eCommerce mobile app with Nautica Magento mobile
app builder.
Highlights of Magento Mobile App Creator
Design control: The admin gets complete design control of the eCommerce mobile apps. The store admin can change the banners, images and other factors from the web admin interface.

Multiple Theme Colors: There are a number of app theme colors to choose from.The store admin can choose the one that suits the theme of his site.

Real-time synchronization: No manual synchronization involved. The real-time webstore and app synchronization allows the merchants to sync the data with the
eCommerce mobile app.

Product support: The Magento Mobile app maker supports all type of products, that is, simple, bundled, configurable as well as virtual or downloadable products.

Tablet-optimized: The Magento mobile app creator offers tablet-optimized apps. Iteasily adapts to the screen size of SmartPhones and tablets.

Navigation: The layered navigation and filters of Magento eCommerce app builder allows the users to browse the store without any hassle.

Multi-lingual support: Magento eCommerce mobile app maker enables automatic language translation. The RTL (Right to Left) support enables you to display the contents of the app in languages such as Hebrew, Arabic, Urdu, Persian/Farsi,
Dhivehi/Maldivian, and others.

Payment and shipping methods: The Android mobile app supports all types of
payment and shipping methods.

Coupon support: The Magento mobile app builder by Knowband support all types of coupons.

Push notification: The unlimited push notification offered by the Magento mobile app creator enables you to send personalized notifications to the customers.

Zopim Chat Services: The Magento eCommerce mobile app creator has build-in
Zopim Chat Services. The store admin can offer 24*7 live chat option to their
customers.

Social login options: The Facebook and Google+ login options offered by Mobile App Builder for Magento allows easy login to the customers.

Wishlist: The visitors can even save the products that they find interesting in their Wishlist for future reference.

Simplified checkout: The simplified checkout of the eCommerce mobile app makesonline shopping effortless for the customers.

Order tracking: The customers get order tracking options to track of their order
status.
Voice Search: Android Mobile App Builder for Magento offers voice search options as well.

How to use/test the App?

1. Install the Free Magento extension in your store and enable it. Get the free plugin
from here:
https://www.knowband.com/magento-android-mobile-app-builder-free
2. Install this mobile app builder in your mobile and enter the URL of your store.
Example, if your website URL is http://www.example.com/, you shall simply enter -
http://www.example.com/ in the app.
3. That's it, your store is now ready for the mobile platforms. You may test the same.

https://www.knowband.com/magento-mobile-app-builder

Contact us
In case, you need any assistance while installation or for custom changes in the
mobile app, please contact us using the undersigned details.
support@knowband.com
descriptionShort: Transform your Magento store into a mobile App seamlessly with our services.
title: Nautica Magento Mobile App
